Hi all,

I'm trying to set up a specific Robots honoring policy, however th=
e sample
commented in CXML is obsolete:
 <bean id=3D"robotsHonoringPolicy"
=
class=3D"org.archive.modules.net.RobotsHonoringPolicy">
<property name=3D"t=
ype" value=3D"IGNORE" />
 </bean>
Since I'm using Heritrix 3.1.1-SNAPSHOT, =
the
class org.archive.modules.net.RobotsHonoringPolicy is not found any mor=
e. Is
this a package change ? Class name change ? Do you have any recent CX=
ML
example ?

cheers
